wrath.client.graphics

Class EntityRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.client.graphics.EntityRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class EntityRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
    Class exclusive to the client to describe Render-able entities.

    • Method Detail

      • bindLight

        public void bindLight(Light light)
        Links a Light to the described entity.
        Parameters:
        light - The Light to link with the entity.

      • bindModel

        public void bindModel(Model model)
        Links a Model to the described entity. If a valid EntityDescriptor was provided to this Entity, this method should not be called as it is all handled automatically.
        Parameters:
        model - The Model to link with the entity.

      • getShineDampening

        public float getShineDampening()
        Gets the distance at which the renderer's camera can no longer see reflected light.

      • render

        public void render(boolean consolidated)
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        Called to render the said object.
        Specified by:
        render in interface Renderable
        Parameters:
        consolidated - If true, the code will run properly without any additional steps, meaning renderSetup() and renderStop() are called automatically.

      • renderSetup

      • setSpecularLightingProperties

        public void setSpecularLightingProperties(float reflectivity,
                                          float shineDampening)
        Sets the values of variables used to calculate specular lighting.
        Parameters:
        reflectivity - The amount, in floating point number, the Entity is susceptible to having specular light reflect off of it. Default 0.
        shineDampening - The distance at which the renderer's camera can no longer see reflected light. Default 1.

      • update

        public void update()
        Changes the model's shader settings to fit the current settings.

      • renderEntity

        public static void renderEntity(wrath.common.entities.Entity entity,
                                Model model,
                                org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f transformationMatrix)
        Renders an entity without creating an EntityRenderer object.
        Parameters:
        entity - The Entity that is attached to the Model.
        model - The Model to render.
        transformationMatrix - A Matrix4f containing positional data. Should be created with ClientUtils.createTransformationMatrix(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f, float, float, float, float).

      • renderEntity

        public static void renderEntity(wrath.common.entities.Entity entity,
                                wrath.common.entities.EntityDescriptor descriptor,
                                org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f transformationMatrix)
        Renders an entity without creating an EntityRenderer object.
        Parameters:
        entity - The Entity that is attached to the Model.
        descriptor - The EntityDescriptor describing the assets to render.
        transformationMatrix - A Matrix4f containing positional data. Should be created with ClientUtils.createTransformationMatrix(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f, float, float, float, float).
